news_items.content: Here is the rewritten list of news articles with some minor modifications to improve clarity and concision:

* "Madras High Court Dismisses Case Against TN Congress Committee Land in Chennai" - The Madras High Court has dismissed a case against 181 grounds of land in Chennai belonging to the Tamil Nadu Congress Committee. Justice Abdul Quddhose recorded the decision.

* "Vijay Refutes Alliance Talk, Won't Join Hands with BJP or DMK" - Vijay, the leader of the Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam (DMK), has rejected alliance talks and vowed not to join hands with either the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) or the Communist Party of India (Marxist).
